context: This is a 'goal' in the sense of the 'Sustainable Development Goals' - some achievement for a community to aspire to
This is the plural version of the goal key
This refers to the 'home page' of a website
This refers to a set of data that indicates progress (or lack of progress) towards one of the Sustainable Development Goals
This is the plural version of the indicator key
This word identifies a software or web project as being in the early stages of development
This is a 'tag line' for a website - usually a catchy one-sentence elaboration of a site's title
This refers to a section of the site for performing keyword searches to find particular indicators
A message for the user - after they have performed an online search - to indicate that their search produced no results
A message for describing a set of search results - to be followed by whatever the user searched for. For example - if the user searched for 'foo' - this might be 'Search results for foo'
An item for a website's navigation menu pointing to its 'About' page - which will provide general information about the website
A label describing the navigation menu of a website

An item for a website's navigation menu pointing to its 'Reporting Status' page - which will provide information and status about the current state of each indicator - in terms of whether the site has data or not
A label describing information - any other metadata about a particular indicator - not covered by more specific labels
A label describing information - any calculations that were used in the production of a dataset
A label describing information - a list of definitions of terms used within other metadata fields
A label describing information - the unit of measurement that is being represented in a dataset
A label describing information - a hyperlink that leads to a United Nations web page with information about a particular indicator
A label describing information - the numeric code for a particular indicator
A label describing information - the definition for a particular indicator - as provided by the United Nations
A label describing information - the name of a particular indicator
A label describing information - the geographical area covered by a dataset
A label describing information - contact information for the person or agency that provided data
A label describing information - the earliest date at which data for a particular indicator was provided by a particular person or agency
A label describing information - the geographical area covered in the data provided by a particular person or agency
A label describing information - the date at which a particular person or agency plans to update their provided data
A label describing information - the name of any organization associated with some provided data
A label describing information - any other information about a particular source of data for a particular indicator
A label describing information - the frequency with which a particular source of data will provide updates
A label describing information - The date at which a particular source provided their data
A label describing information - some classification of a particular source of data for a particular indicator
A label describing information - the overall SDG target associated with a particular indicator
A label describing information - the numeric id for the overall SDG target associated with a particular indicator
A label describing information - the United Nations custodian agency associated with a particular indicator
A label describing information - the 'tier' (1 - 2 - or 3) that the United Nations has assigned to a particular indicator
A button for editing some content
A button for editing data
A button for editing metadata
A button that displays some data in the form of a chart
A label describing information - any general information about a dataset - displayed below the data visualization on the page
A label describing information - a description of the geographical area covered by a dataset
A button that displays the global metadata about a particular indicator - as provided by the United Nations
A button that displays some data in the form of a map
A button that displays the national metadata about a particular indicator - as provided by that country
A label describing information - where some data originally came from
A button that displays information about where some data originally came from
A label describing a section of the page that allows the user to filter data by sub-category
A button that displays some data in the form of a table (rows and columns)
A label describing information - the unit of measurement that is being represented in a dataset
The label of a widget that allows the user to change the type of unit that is being represented in a data visualization
Describing a section where the status is reported for each goal.
